Eventually, it turned out that the cause of the\nblackout had been electrical instability\nresulting from chronic power shortages.%K%P
The blackouts Akane had been causing\nhad actually been keeping the larger\nproblem at bay.%K%P
Once the problem was known, Kannagi started\nrunning planned rolling blackouts\nto deal with the shortages.%K%P
As for Akane, since she solved the major blackout\nshe hadn't caused any more small ones.%K%P
She was able to finish rehab, without fear of\nbeing demoted to a spirit and without fear\nof getting Tsubaki Apartments demolished.%K%P
We were sitting on the veranda one day.%K%P
'Phew... Lately, it's been getting colder\nwhen the sun goes down.\nWinter is on the way.'%K%P
'Yep. I hope it gets here soon.'%K%P
'Why? I hate going out in the cold.'%K%P
'Really? I'm looking forward to spending all kinds\nof seasons with you.'%K%P
I pulled Akane even closer to me.%K%P
'If you put it that way, I hope winter\ncomes soon, too.'%K%P
'Right?'%K%P
We sat there and watched the evening sky.%K%P
'The stars are so pretty.'%K%P
'Yeah, they seem particularly bright tonight.'%K%P
The artificial light of the city was reduced\nas some parts were in a rolling blackout,\nso the stars shone through brighter.%K%P
'You know, it feels like we met just yesterday.'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
But I felt she had a point.%K%P
'I didn't want to be rehabilitated at first.\nBut now I know how hard life can be for people.\nI'm happy I could change...'%K%P
'It all happened because of how hard you tried.'%K%P
'No, it never would have happened with just me.\nI only made it because I met you.'%K%P
'I'm so glad you stopped for me that night.'%K%P
'If I hadn't met you, I never could have\nchanged like this.'%K%P
'I never would have noticed people's kindness,\nI would've kept being selfish. And I would have\nkept causing trouble until I became a spirit.'%K%P
I patted Akane as she thought about her past.%K%P
'It doesn't matter. We did meet.'%K%P
'What's the use of thinking about what-ifs\non a night like this?'%K%P
'Yeah. I don't even want to imagine it.'%K%P
She touched my hand gently.%K%P
I wrapped my fingers in hers and squeezed her hand.%K%P
'Akane, are you happy now?'%K%P
Akane's face went blank for an instant,\nthen she broke out in a broad smile.%K%P
'Of course I am!'%K%P
Akane went on to speak, full of confidence.%K%P
'Everyone around me is great,\nMaika and Inori are so wonderful,\nand you're my boyfriend. I'm so happy!'%K%P
'Yeah... I'm happy I'm your boyfriend, too.'%K%P
I was happy just having her beside me.%K%P
I was so in love with her, I couldn't imagine life\nwithout her anymore.%K%P
'But it's so strange. With just a little change in\nperspective, the world suddenly looks\nso much more fun than before.'%K%P
'I changed because I met you. I got to know\nso many people, and see how they lived.\nAnd then I grew to want to protect them.'%K%P
'And now that you have control of your powers,\nwe can be even happier together.'%K%P
'I could only do that because of you.\nI finally learned to think about\nother people's feelings.'%K%P
'There are so many people here besides just me,\nand they all have their own lives and feelings.'%K%P
'I'm an Aragami, but I want to help spread my\nhappiness to everyone little by little.'%K%P
'You will. You might be an Aragami, but\nwhen it comes to caring for people,\nyou're a true goddess.'%K%P
'Of course! But you know, I am what I am.'%K%P
'I do what I want! That might cause you a bit\nof bother, but it might also help some people.'%K%P
'Isn't that bad for a goddess?'%K%P
'Maybe, but remember! I'm an Aragami!'%K%P
